requirements.summary: Home screen shows total applications and a single primary action that increments by 1 with immediate UI feedback.
acceptanceCriteria: Home screen displays a clearly labeled total applications counter.
A single primary button (e.g., “I applied today” / “Log application”) increments the counter by exactly 1.
Increment action provides immediate visual feedback (counter updates without page reload).

file_operations.description: Implement the home screen UI that displays the total count (derived from stored entries) and a single primary action to log an application; update the UI immediately using React Query optimistic updates while persisting via the backend capability.
Create React Query hooks to fetch recent application entries and to log a new entry; expose derived count and mutation state for immediate visual feedback on increment.
Wire the HomeScreen into the app shell and ensure it is the primary view users land on after authentication.

requirements.summary: Provide a lightweight per-application logging flow (timestamp + optional company/role/notes), show newest-first recent entries, and allow deleting an entry with total updating.
acceptanceCriteria: User can add an application log entry when incrementing or via an “Add entry” flow.
Recent entries list shows newest-first and includes at least the timestamp.
Total counter equals the number of stored entries (or is kept consistent if stored separately).
User can delete an entry and the total updates accordingly.

file_operations.description: Create a compact entry form (company, role, notes optional) that can be used inline on the HomeScreen or in an “Add entry” section; use shadcn-ui form primitives (e.g., Input/Textarea/Button/Card) to keep styling consistent. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Render a newest-first list of recent entries showing at least the timestamp plus any provided fields; include a per-row delete control that calls the delete mutation and updates the list/count. Use shadcn-ui components for list rows/actions (e.g., Card/Button/AlertDialog). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add mutations and cache update logic for: (1) log entry with current timestamp and optional fields; (2) delete entry with optimistic removal and count recalculation from the cached list; ensure list sorting is newest-first.

Align frontend type surface with the backend capabilities used by the UI for entries (fetch, add, and delete). If a delete capability exists in the backend canister but is missing from typings, add the missing method signature so the UI can call it safely.

Integrate ApplicationEntryForm and RecentEntriesList into the home screen; ensure the primary increment action can either (a) log immediately with minimal fields or (b) open/expand the lightweight entry form flow.

requirements.summary: Add motivational UI: encouraging message based on count ranges and a next-milestone indicator.
acceptanceCriteria: Encouraging message text changes when crossing defined count ranges.
UI shows the next milestone target number based on the current count.
All user-facing text is in English.

file_operations.description: Implement pure helper functions to map application count to: (1) encouraging English message for ranges (0, 1–4, 5–9, 10+), and (2) next milestone target number (e.g., next multiple of 10 or a small set of milestones).
Display the dynamic encouraging message and the next milestone indicator alongside the counter, updating automatically as the derived count changes.

requirements.summary: Apply a calm, supportive, consistent visual theme across the home and entries UI, avoiding a blue/purple-dominant palette.
acceptanceCriteria: App uses a consistent, calm visual style across the home counter view and entries list.
Primary action is visually prominent and accessible (clear contrast, readable type).

file_operations.description: Define global Tailwind layers and set CSS variables used by the Tailwind theme to a calm, supportive palette (e.g., warm neutrals with green/orange accents) that is not blue/purple-dominant; establish consistent typography and spacing defaults.

Create a consistent layout wrapper (max width, padding, header area) used across screens/sections; ensure primary action styling is prominent and accessible using shadcn-ui Button variants where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wrap authenticated application content with AppLayout to ensure consistent spacing and styling across the home counter view and entries list.

requirements.summary: Add and display the generated hero illustration on the home screen as a responsive static asset.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated image files are placed under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Home screen renders the illustration without fetching it from the backend.
Image scales responsively and does not break layout on small screens.

file_operations.description: Add the generated static image asset at the exact required path: frontend/public/assets/generated/job-hunt-hero.dim_1600x900.png.

Render the hero illustration from frontend/public/assets/generated/job-hunt-hero.dim_1600x900.png in a header/hero area with responsive sizing and safe aspect handling so it does not break layout on small screens.
